Didn't work for me...I patched successfully multiple times, but I still get a "time expired" message when I launch office. If this ever worked, my guess is that if you patch before the time expired it worked, but not anymore.

duh, 

If it doesn't install or work, do the following: 

1. uninstall Office by deleting it from 
- Applications
- Library/ApplicationSupport
- Library/Receipts

2. disconnect from the web

3. set your date back to anything before Nov. 10th

4. install Office, let it start up, then exit.

5. apply patch

6. start office, exit

7. reconnect to the web and set your date back to the actual date.
